comment:
* Describes the buildtime configuration of a network.
 * Holds settings read from resources.
 * @hide

variables.name: radio
variables.comment: * the radio number from radio attributes config

variables.name: priority
variables.comment: * higher number == higher priority when turning off connections

variables.name: dependencyMet
variables.comment: * indicates the boot time dependencyMet setting

variables.name: restoreTime
variables.comment:
* indicates the default restoral timer in seconds
     * if the network is used as a special network feature
     * -1 indicates no restoration of default

methods.name: public boolean isDefault()
methods.comment: * Indicates if this network is supposed to be default-routable
